divs: Sighting Detailswas out this night at 11pm eastern and observed 6 to 8 small objects in the western sky no sound but were glowing red to orange and exibited interesting patterns of movement to high in the sky to be helicopters but flying to slow to be jets in my opinion the event lasted for maybe about an hour. the weather here that night was cloudy with a breeze of 10 to 15 mph. I checked with the news services here and it looks like this event went unreported.thank you
